about_the_game:
Lockstone Mountains is a top-down, action-adventure game in which you Pilot large flying vessels in inhospitable skies. These floating ships are controlled using a signature rudder-and-keel system with a physics-based flying model. Guns, cannons, missile launchers and much more are at your disposition to fight back swarms of enemies. Sails the winds along with other members of the Rook expedition, and uncover the secrets of the Lockstone Mountains, which is set in a hard-fantasy science-based steampunk setting.

Complete Your Arsenal!

The wealth of dangers roaming the skies are only matched by the expedition's ingenuity. Expand your arsenal to counter every threat you discover. From small mounted rifles to high-yield proximity detonated missiles, the sky is quite literally the limit! Every hull has a unique combination of hardpoints, each with weapon classes and a set cone of fire. Experiment with hulls and loadouts to find the combination that works for you!

Explore the Lockstone Mountains

Embark on expeditions to different island clusters in this strange new region. Discover lifeforms that inhabit the storm and uncover the fate of an ancient civilisation. Will you learn from their mistake and find your way home?

How close is it to being done

The game is close to content complete but still has a small way to go. I am a solo developper working part-time on this game, but if enough interest is garnered I will also hire a professional artist and get in contact with a publisher. All forms of feedback are welcome on the discord server and every wishlist is appreciated.

short_description: Wake up in the world of Lockstone Mountains as the main Pilot of the Rook expedition. Explore the world, complete quests and gather materials to research new technologies, ships and weapons. Powerful enemies and intriguing mysteries await in the Lockstone Mountains.
